snippet: The Islanders signed their first-round pick, Griffin Reinhart, to a three-year entry-level contract.
abstract: New York Islanders sign defenseman Griffin Reinhart, their first-round pick, to a three-year entry-level contract.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders signed their first-round pick, Griffin Reinhart, to a three-year entry-level contract.

headline.main: Islanders Sign Defenseman, Team’s Top Pick in N.H.L. Draft
headline.print_headline: Islanders Sign Defenseman, Team’s Top Pick in N.H.L. Draft
